about_the_game:
Includes the following DLC packs:

Steel Girl Set: Includes Mechanical Ear Guard, Mechanical Eye Guard, Mechanical Bust Guard, Mechanical Waist Guard, Mechanical Foot Guard, Modern Bowl Cut, Iron Will, Mega Ribbon, Cross Scar, Armored Knight, Tiered Knight, Iron Knight, Long Decorated Hair, Thousand Eye.

Game Expert Crimson Set: Includes Chess Board Ribbon, Dice Earrings, Card One Piece, Monotone Garter, Black Enamel Shoes, Single Antenna, Stubborn, Rage Crystal, Hex Makeup, Crimson Vest, Crimson Hakama, Crimson Zori, Long Winged Twin, Unstable.

Sci-Fi Warrior Lady 2:50 Set: Includes Cool Headset, Cool Forehead Protector, Cool Body Suit, Full Body Tights Top, V-Shorts, Full Body Tights Bottoms, Cool Long Boots, Cool Ponytail, Ill-Tempered.

School Swimsuit Princess Set: Includes Lily Ribbon, Cheeky Flower, Lily Dress, School Swimsuit Top, Boomerang Protector, School Swimsuit Shorts, Bunny Sandals, Side Braids, Star Eyes.

Wedding Ribbon Set: Includes Bride’s Tiara, Pearl Earrings, Bride’s Strapless Top, Full-Body Ribbon Top, Bride’s Dress Skirt, Full-Body Ribbon Shorts, Pure White Ribbon Pumps, Princess Up, Hopeful Eyes.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here:
detailed_description:
Includes the following DLC packs:

Steel Girl Set: Includes Mechanical Ear Guard, Mechanical Eye Guard, Mechanical Bust Guard, Mechanical Waist Guard, Mechanical Foot Guard, Modern Bowl Cut, Iron Will, Mega Ribbon, Cross Scar, Armored Knight, Tiered Knight, Iron Knight, Long Decorated Hair, Thousand Eye.

Game Expert Crimson Set: Includes Chess Board Ribbon, Dice Earrings, Card One Piece, Monotone Garter, Black Enamel Shoes, Single Antenna, Stubborn, Rage Crystal, Hex Makeup, Crimson Vest, Crimson Hakama, Crimson Zori, Long Winged Twin, Unstable.

Sci-Fi Warrior Lady 2:50 Set: Includes Cool Headset, Cool Forehead Protector, Cool Body Suit, Full Body Tights Top, V-Shorts, Full Body Tights Bottoms, Cool Long Boots, Cool Ponytail, Ill-Tempered.

School Swimsuit Princess Set: Includes Lily Ribbon, Cheeky Flower, Lily Dress, School Swimsuit Top, Boomerang Protector, School Swimsuit Shorts, Bunny Sandals, Side Braids, Star Eyes.

Wedding Ribbon Set: Includes Bride’s Tiara, Pearl Earrings, Bride’s Strapless Top, Full-Body Ribbon Top, Bride’s Dress Skirt, Full-Body Ribbon Shorts, Pure White Ribbon Pumps, Princess Up, Hopeful Eyes.

* Some DLC items will be need to be purchased at a shop before they will be available for use or as equipment.
* Certain clothing/armour items must have specific Peon Job Titles unlocked in order to appear.
* Certain items require other items to be owned before they will appear in the shop.
For further details DLC item conditions, please see the excellent DLC list on the Mugen Souls Wikia page, here:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 512Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 1GB RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
